body_html: I noticed that they in python have over a dozen(!) of instances of copy-pasted lines for reshaping gradients due to broadcasting feature, and decided to make a helper class ReshapeGradientsWRTBroadcasting that will make everything for me.
body_text: I noticed that they in python have over a dozen(!) of instances of copy-pasted lines for reshaping gradients due to broadcasting feature, and decided to make a helper class ReshapeGradientsWRTBroadcasting that will make everything for me.
body: I noticed that they in [python](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L826) have over a dozen(!) of instances of copy-pasted lines for reshaping gradients due to broadcasting feature, and decided to make a helper class `ReshapeGradientsWRTBroadcasting` that will make everything for me.
